definition: victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)

sentences.english: Fourth, I will pay a visit to some tourist attractions to widen my horizon.
sentences.chinese: 最后，我还要参观一些游览胜地，开阔眼界。

sentences.english: In ancient times, everyone is already Yong Nam toured the famous summer resort destination.
sentences.chinese: 在古代，青秀山已经是邕南著名的避暑游览胜地。

sentences.english: Famous painters usually go there on special trip for drawing.
sentences.chinese: 诸景传说众多，常有著名的画家专程来此览胜作画。

sentences.english: What are the main tourist attractions in Beijing?
sentences.chinese: 北京有哪些主要的游览胜地？

sentences.english: Taibai Mountain is a famous place of interest in Shaanxi Province.
sentences.chinese: 太白山是陕西著名的森林游览胜地。

sentences.english: There is a China of the plains, easily traveled, a tourist delight.
sentences.chinese: 中国有一部分是平原，旅行便利，为游览胜地。

sentences.english: It is a 11)unique place to stay.
sentences.chinese: 这是一处独特的游览胜地。

sentences.english: The city is today a popular resort. Population, 4,300.
sentences.chinese: 今天该城是一著名游览胜地。

sentences.english: It has long been a major scenic attraction of the world.
sentences.chinese: 这里也一直是主要的世界级游览胜地。

sentences.english: Therefore Lushan became poet and celebrities from around the resort.
sentences.chinese: 于是庐山就成了诗人，名人的游览胜地。
